Arbitrator","name":"_arbitrator","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"uint256","name":"_evidenceGroupID","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"_party","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"string","name":"_evidence","type":"string"}],"name":"Evidence","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"contract Arbitrator","name":"_arbitrator","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"uint256","name":"_disputeID","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"_metaEvidenceID","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"_evidenceGroupID","type":"uint256"}],"name":"Dispute","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"contract Arbitrator","name":"_arbitrator","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"uint256","name":"_disputeID","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"_ruling","type":"uint256"}],"name":"Ruling","type":"event"}],"devdoc":{"methods":{"challengeRequest(bytes32,string)":{"details":"Challenges the latest request of a item. Accepts enough ETH to fund a potential dispute considering the current required amount. Reimburses unused ETH. TRUSTED.","params":{"_evidence":"A link to an evidence using its URI. Ignored if not provided or if not enough funds were provided to create a dispute.","_itemID":"The ID of the item with the request to challenge."}},"changeTimeToChallenge(uint256)":{"details":"Change the duration of the challenge period.","params":{"_challengePeriodDuration":"The new duration of the challenge period."}},"executeRequest(bytes32)":{"details":"Executes a request if the challenge period passed and no one challenged the request.","params":{"_item":"The item with the request to execute."}},"findItem(bytes,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Find an item by matching column values. - Example: Item [18, 'PNK', 'Pinakion', '0xca35b7d915458ef540ade6068dfe2f44e8fa733c'] RLP encoded: 0xe383504e4b128850696e616b696f6e94ca35b7d915458ef540ade6068dfe2f44e8fa733c Input for remix: [\"0xe3\",\"0x83\",\"0x50\",\"0x4e\",\"0x4b\",\"0x12\",\"0x88\",\"0x50\",\"0x69\",\"0x6e\",\"0x61\",\"0x6b\",\"0x69\",\"0x6f\",\"0x6e\",\"0x94\",\"0xca\",\"0x35\",\"0xb7\",\"0xd9\",\"0x15\",\"0x45\",\"0x8e\",\"0xf5\",\"0x40\",\"0xad\",\"0xe6\",\"0x06\",\"0x8d\",\"0xfe\",\"0x2f\",\"0x44\",\"0xe8\",\"0xfa\",\"0x73\",\"0x3c\"]","params":{"_count":"The number of items to iterate while searching.","_cursor":"The index from where to start looking for matches.","_returnCount":"The size of the array to return with matching values.","_rlpEncodedMatch":"The RLP encoded item to match against the items on the list."},"return":"An array with items that match the query."},"fundAppeal(bytes32,uint8)":{"details":"Takes up to the total amount required to fund a side of an appeal. Reimburses the rest. Creates an appeal if both sides are fully funded. TRUSTED.","params":{"_itemID":"The ID of the item with the appeal to fund.","_side":"The recipient of the contribution."}},"isPermitted(bytes32)":{"details":"Return true if the item is on the list.","params":{"_itemID":"The ID of the item to be queried."},"return":"allowed True if the item is allowed, false otherwise."},"queryItems(bytes32,uint256,bool[8],bool,address)":{"details":"Return the values of the items the query finds. This function is O(n), where n is the number of items. This could exceed the gas limit, therefore this function should only be used for interface display and not by other contracts.","params":{"_count":"The number of items to return.","_cursor":"The ID of the items from which to start iterating. To start from either the oldest or newest item.","_filter":"The filter to use. Each element of the array in sequence means: - Include absent items in result. - Include registered items in result. - Include items with registration requests that are not disputed in result. - Include items with clearing requests that are not disputed in result. - Include disputed items with registration requests in result. - Include disputed items with clearing requests in result. - Include items submitted by _party. - Include items challenged by _party.","_oldestFirst":"Whether to sort from oldest to the newest item.","_party":"The address to use if checking for items submitted or challenged by a specific party."},"return":"The values of the tokens found and whether there are more tokens for the current filter and sort."},"rule(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Give a ruling for a dispute. Can only be called by the arbitrator. TRUSTED. Overrides parent function to account for the situation where the winner loses a case due to paying less appeal fees than expected.","params":{"_disputeID":"ID of the dispute in the arbitrator contract.","_ruling":"Ruling given by the arbitrator. Note that 0 is reserved for \"Not able/wanting to make a decision\"."}},"withdrawFeesAndRewards(address,bytes32,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Reimburses contributions if no disputes were raised. If a dispute was raised, sends the fee stake rewards and reimbursements proportional to the contributions made to the winner of a dispute.","params":{"_beneficiary":"The address that made contributions to a request.","_itemID":"The ID of the item with the request from which to withdraw.","_request":"The request from which to withdraw.","_round":"The round from which to withdraw."}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/home/betelgiuse/Documents/visus/kleros/repos/gtcr/contracts/GTCRMock.sol":"GTCRMock"},"evmVersion":"byzantium","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/home/betelgiuse/Documents/visus/kleros/repos/gtcr/contracts/GTCRMock.sol":{"keccak256":"0x750f59d9d8f8ef72fb87ecf08de873b6892d9ed19dccf997e8af43b0bc8954d1","urls":["bzz-raw://447c143483bb08f2ce2e9a0f31f74d1fb14b4a05d6720ee4416f5a3d67a142b6","dweb:/ipfs/QmTZBTsa5W6KKbPUT4gCxxhNZgPxc1xKYHzzRHoPMNLGBF"]},"/home/betelgiuse/Documents/visus/kleros/repos/gtcr/contracts/libraries/CappedMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x04a17d5c7186e2e34130c85a33b3fd8f58c7b76b9b43a81becf2d041e72b9b95","urls":["bzz-raw://ee2ae226ac135267908b88ea421577417e3d59fba5b9f392c3623a93b301848d","dweb:/ipfs/QmXaZ3XyB5EkzLxMQJbFNbhq9NpCsAzdgebzh4K2m9fatv"]},"@kleros/erc-792/contracts/Arbitrator.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6a2a5c75815c73c8fe2dc3677659436a44af8fa8b4714b5a00630817df458f9d","urls":["bzz-raw://419e5eaa0cfa63d7882856b0b316f8132e4774784ffe094173264f401b2ccb86","dweb:/ipfs/QmPa8MH8s5NHA2J7P9MxDzYNyiuqUaFzFyFeBxpEKE4sjY"]},"@kleros/erc-792/contracts/IArbitrable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7528fa89aa1173d56cab79d4cdf64411d2e51bcbf174dbc90ddeed3168729f67","urls":["bzz-raw://df1d78aea64a1571fae456925789c3eeed1462523c9d2bb763cdee1574b0d67d","dweb:/ipfs/QmXN3yahbqzkifHJ7rSo5o1Ck8kEZCeGs8mko2VTjFYVmS"]},"@kleros/erc-792/contracts/erc-1497/IEvidence.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0df6c78ba8d6d3be46388347acb5642dfc3ea96344d303b5e9974c1041f566be","urls":["bzz-raw://ba0547df44f4d508c53be34a853fc6bfda988fc147d32af55d94e1b6a68635b6","dweb:/ipfs/Qmbj2Jqb2fqqu2firAp5WnWdUXaToXsXCwup1vmKveoTSK"]},"solidity-bytes-utils/contracts/BytesLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0xde793835499803e9a2b59683de8bca5b77e2c4dc63748cf8b72973193e65e656","urls":["bzz-raw://736c496152ca418b2716489383a753cddf723707679e5e5f1ae27f07d1c288b4","dweb:/ipfs/QmXeZ45curYeCpaCwkM9Qz2FCFLG9JNG4ReLKmaru5LJ4P"]},"solidit typeDescriptions.typeString: struct GTCRMock.Request storage ref[] storage ref
struct GTCRMock.Request storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.name: queryItems

challengeRequest(bytes32,string).details: Challenges the latest request of a item. Accepts enough ETH to fund a potential dispute considering the current required amount. Reimburses unused ETH. TRUSTED.

params._evidence: A link to an evidence using its URI. Ignored if not provided or if not enough funds were provided to create a dispute.
params._itemID: The ID of the item with the request to challenge.

changeTimeToChallenge(uint256).details: Change the duration of the challenge period.

params._challengePeriodDuration: The new duration of the challenge period.

executeRequest(bytes32).details: Executes a request if the challenge period passed and no one challenged the request.

params._item: The item with the request to execute.

params._count: The number of items to iterate while searching.
params._cursor: The index from where to start looking for matches.
params._returnCount: The size of the array to return with matching values.
params._rlpEncodedMatch: The RLP encoded item to match against the items on the list.

findItem(bytes,uint256,uint256,uint256).return: An array with items that match the query.

fundAppeal(bytes32,uint8).details: Takes up to the total amount required to fund a side of an appeal. Reimburses the rest. Creates an appeal if both sides are fully funded. TRUSTED.

params._itemID: The ID of the item with the appeal to fund.

isPermitted(bytes32).details: Return true if the item is on the list.

params._itemID: The ID of the item to be queried.

isPermitted(bytes32).return: allowed True if the item is allowed, false otherwise.

queryItems(bytes32,uint256,bool[8],bool,.details: Return the values of the items the query finds. This function is O(n), where n is the number of items. This could exceed the gas limit, therefore this function should only be used for interface display and not by other contracts.

params._count: The number of items to return.
params._cursor: The ID of the items from which to start iterating. To start from either the oldest or newest item.
params._filter: The filter to use. Each element of the array in sequence means: - Include absent items in result. - Include registered items in result. - Include items with registration requests that are not disputed in result. - Include items with clearing requests that are not disputed in result. - Include disputed items with registration requests in result. - Include disputed items with clearing requests in result. - Include items submitted by _party. - Include items challenged by _party.
params._oldestFirst: Whether to sort from oldest to the newest item.
params._party: The address to use if checking for items submitted or challenged by a specific party.

queryItems(bytes32,uint256,bool[8],bool,.return: The values of the tokens found and whether there are more tokens for the current filter and sort.

rule(uint256,uint256).details: Give a ruling for a dispute. Can only be called by the arbitrator. TRUSTED. Overrides parent function to account for the situation where the winner loses a case due to paying less appeal fees than expected.

params._disputeID: ID of the dispute in the arbitrator contract.
params._ruling: Ruling given by the arbitrator. Note that 0 is reserved for "Not able/wanting to make a decision".

withdrawFeesAndRewards(address,bytes32,u.details: Reimburses contributions if no disputes were raised. If a dispute was raised, sends the fee stake rewards and reimbursements proportional to the contributions made to the winner of a dispute.

params._beneficiary: The address that made contributions to a request.
params._itemID: The ID of the item with the request from which to withdraw.
params._request: The request from which to withdraw.
params._round: The round from which to withdraw.
